text:
- We're known for serving
insurance primarily,
but also energy and finance.
The biggest way to put it is we help
those companies mitigate risk.
As a company, we had a mandate

to move out of our data
centers and into the cloud.
So we had a lot of people
that were taking on new initiatives
and moving everything to the cloud
and how the cloud operates very different

than how data centers operate
and what we were used to.
Primarily, what we've done lately
is invest in the AWS Skills Guild Program,
which is a formal program that has allowed

us to kind of take what
we were already doing
and really supercharge it.
People are able to take a new concept
that they're learning in a training
and apply it, but in a very easy way.

With the training that
we've been able to roll out,
we've been able to move the vast majority
of our business to AWS.

That's really what's enabled
our business to move forward,
especially with the pandemic times
and things changed pretty dramatically
for the insurance industry.

So we were able to create
applications that enabled them

to do remote adjusting
and scale those out.
And we saw dramatic increases in scale
and a lot of that was done via live video,
so huge amounts of data that we were
now collecting that we weren't before.
We could just scale with that need
and really serve our customers better.
